title: Stochastic Processes I
description: Simple random walk and the theory of discrete time Markov chains.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: MATH 3215 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 3225 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 3235 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 3670 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 3770 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ISYE 3770 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or CEE 3770 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
